column2: Adidas Women Purple Melia Flip Flops
column22:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Adidas created this pair of super cool flip flops for those who want fashion doubled with comfort. The print on the foot-bed is in a stylish contrast colour lends to its appeal. Pair them with a tee and your favourite slept-in style denims for a casual outing.

  • Product Details

  • Purple flip flops
column23:
has a thong style strap with branding on it
Printed footbed with multi coloured diagonal striped patterns and branding on it
Textured tough rubber outsole
Warranty: 3 months

  • Material & Care

  • Rubber
    Wipe with a moist cloth to remove dirt
